sent.orig: We see it as it was long ago: perhaps hundreds or thounsands of years ago.
sent.trans: 我们看到的只是它以前的样子：可能还是几百年或几千年以前的样子呢。

sent.orig: My memory still stop two years ago or long time ago. Am I changed?
sent.trans: 我的记忆一直停止在以前，我变了吗？

sent.orig: I saw him no longer ago than five minutes ago.
sent.trans: 就在五分钟前，我见过他。

sent.orig: Block-printing was invented 1,300 years ago, and movable type 800 years ago.
sent.trans: 在一千三百年前，已经发明了刻版印刷。在八百年前，更发明了活字印刷。

sent.orig: Apparently, a wed couple lived here once, long ago. Maybe 20 years ago.
sent.trans: 很久以前，也许20年前，有一对结婚不久的夫妻住在这。
